param.name: OfferObject
param.comment: The object on which this mission is based e.g. A Ship / Station / Signal Leak. Only needed for missions with a physical location.

param.name: Client
param.comment: Pre-existing client

param.name: ClientOwner
param.comment: Overriding owner for reward calculation or creation of $Client if not provided. Defaults to $OfferObject owner if able

param.name: MissionCue
param.comment: Cue the mission is attached to. Defaults to Start (this).

param.name: MissionThread
param.comment: Mission thread for the offer and mission

param.name: GenerateReward
param.comment: If RewardCr or RewardNotoriety are invalid, generate them?

param.name: RewardCr
param.comment: If the reward for this mission is credits, the number of credits should be set to this variable.

param.name: RewardObj
param.comment: If the reward for this mission is not credits, and is an object, it should be set to this variable.

param.name: RewardText
param.comment: Any text needed to define the reward for this mission - may be used in conjunction with $RewardCr and $RewardObj.

param.name: MissionType
param.comment: Variations can override mission type if required

param.name: WithoutOffer
param.comment: Do not create a mission offer. Either run immediatly or wait for WithoutOfferWaitCue

param.name: WithoutOfferWaitCue
param.comment: Do not create a mission offer but wait for this cue to be completed before running the mission

param.name: DeclineButton
param.comment: Have a decline button instead of a back button in the offer conversation

param.name: EventOffer
param.comment: Is the mission offered directly to the player with an interactive event

param.name: ConversationOffer
param.comment: When $EventOffer is false, should this offer be through a conversation with the $Client. Otherwise, offer at mission location

param.name: ConversationTriggerCue
param.comment: If provided, when this cue is signalled, start the mission offer conversation.

param.name: HideFromBBS
param.comment: Hide this offer from the BBS? Show only through locations or special conversation handling.

param.name: OfferDistance
param.comment: Distance to the offer location before it becomes visible on the map or BBS (unless otherwise hidden)

param.name: Page
param.comment: Allows a different text page to be used instead of the generic one. Text IDs must be mapped similarly.

param.name: TextOffset
param.comment: The text offset for this variant's text on the page. Each variant starts at a different offset, but the entries[] within that offset have to match for all variants.

param.name: TextTable
param.comment: Table, usually populated by the mission, to store the texts by an identifier key e.g. $missionname = 'Kill Bala Gi' Check library 'GenerateTextTable' for identifier keys. Pass in a table with such an entry to override the text usually generated from the $Page and $TextOffset

param.name: VoiceTable
param.comment: Table, usually populated by the mission, keys can have a value of 0 (=stay silent)

param.name: TargetTable
param.comment: Table defining which objects need to have leaks repaired and how many e.g. table[ {object1} = table[$amount = 5], {object2} = table[$amount = 3], ]

param.name: ReportSignalCue
param.comment: Cue to be signalled when something happens which could be of interest to the calling cue. Saves values to ReportSignalCue.$FeedbackValue and ReportSignalCue.$EndFeedbackValue

param.name: CancelOfferCue
param.comment: Cue which when completed will force this missions offer to be removed and cleaned up. No effect if mission has been accepted.

param.name: ForceCleanup
param.comment: Cue to force a cleanup from outside when completed
